I wasn't thinking | thinking about how to to answer | about how to to answer | how to to answer | to to answer
S0044: o | si necesito mejorar | necesito mejorar | mejorar

S0045: no necesito saber | necesito saber | saber todo | saber | todo
I don't need to to know | I need to to know | to know everything | to to know | everything
S0046: pero | no me preocupo por hacer errores | me preocupo por | por hacer errores | hacer errores | errores
but | I don't worry about making mistakes | I worry about | about making mistakes | to make mistakes | mistakes
